short_summary: Service truck cap, roof system, &c c.
description: Service truck cap , roof system , andc c.
full_summary:
=====================

**Government Tender Announcement: Service Truck Cap Acquisition**

**Reference Number:** WS3684748571-Doc3734230699  

**Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
  - Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
  - Contact: Rafael Uribe, rafael.uribe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Request for Proposal (RFP)**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence, Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC), is soliciting proposals for the acquisition of a service truck cap and other equipment for installation at the Valcartier Research Centre in Valcartier, Quebec, Canada. The acquisition is part of a larger procurement effort in accordance with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Key Dates:**

* Publication Date: November 2, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: December 13, 2022 at 2:00 PM EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2023

**Important Notes:**

* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EST on December 13, 2022.
* All bids submitted after 2 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
* A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who submit a bid.

**Classification Information:**

* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* UNSPSC Classification: 25174100 (Roof systems)

**Bid Submitting Requirements:**

Proposals must be submitted electronically through the Ariba Discovery platform, accessible at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14528516?extsite=MTQ1Mjg1MTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14528516?extsite=MTQ1Mjg1MTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

**Evaluation Criteria:**

Variations or combinations of the evaluation methods detailed in the RFP will be used to assess proposals.
